abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Agriculture Sector Adjustment
            Loan Project supports the implementation of the
            Government's medium-term agricultural sector adjustment
            program. The principal objective of the program is to
            maintain the growth rate of agriculture at a time of reduced
            public resources. To achieve this objective, actions will be
            taken to: (i) reform the price, marketing and institutional
            framework; (ii) reorient the public investment program in
            agriculture; (iii) strengthen the role of agriculture
            support services including rationalizing the role of the
            public sector; (iv) improve management of the natural
            resources of land, forests and fisheries; and (v) build up
            the institutional capacity for sector performance monitoring
            and impact analysis. The foreign exchange provided by the
            loan will be used to finance: (i) a positive list of
            agricultural inputs needed to stimulate agricultural
            production; and (ii) part of the foreign exchange cost of
            agricultural projects and programs.
